SELECT to_char(sum(a.sumPrice)/ COUNT(*),'999,999,999,999,999')as avgPrice
FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(p.createdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS hiredate , sum(o.price + o.charge)sumPrice FROM orders o INNER JOIN payment p on o.ordernum=p.ordernum WHERE p.createdat BETWEEN TO_DATE(( SELECT min(to_char(createdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) FROM payment), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE((SELECT max(to_char(createdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) FROM payment), 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(p.createdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) a , ( SELECT TO_DATE(( SELECT min(to_char(createdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) FROM payment),'YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL - 1 AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE((SELECT max(to_char(createdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) FROM payment),'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(( SELECT min(to_char(createdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) FROM payment),'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) ) b WHERE b.dt = a.hiredate(+) ORDER BY b.dt
FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(p.createdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS hiredate , sum(o.price + o.charge)sumPrice FROM orders o INNER JOIN payment p on o.ordernum=p.ordernum WHERE p.createdat >= TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(p.createdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) a , ( SELECT TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL - 1 AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) ) b WHERE b.dt = a.hiredate(+) ORDER BY b.dt

FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(p.createdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS hiredate , sum(o.price + o.charge)sumPrice FROM orders o INNER JOIN payment p on o.ordernum=p.ordernum WHERE p.createdat BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(p.createdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) a , ( SELECT TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL - 1 AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) ) b WHERE b.dt = a.hiredate(+) ORDER BY b.dt
